feature.title: Values
feature.texte: I consider that the foundation of a good developer is a constant desire to learn and follow new trends.

feature.title: Goals
feature.texte: My goal is simple: to become a monster in web development and especially in the use of the Vue.js framework.

feature.title: Hobbies
feature.texte: I love music, travelling and video-games. I believe that a  multidisciplinary artistic vision has a positive impact on my work.

about.para: My name is Yoann, I am a 22 years old junior web developer and I am into back-end development. However, I also have an interest indeveloping front-end applications.
My goal is to combine design and technology, in order to create attractive websites as well as web applications.
You will find on this page my resume in pdf as well as projects carried out during my studies or during my free time.
